程序包 org.group4

类 JavaSoundRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<V>
      • javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Void>
        • org.group4.JavaSoundRecorder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Void>, javafx.concurrent.Worker<java.lang.Void>, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class JavaSoundRecorder
extends javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Void>
    This class is used to records the user voice in a new thread.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 javafx.concurrent.Worker

      protected java.lang.Void call()
      Creates a new threads specified for audio recording and records the user voice
      void finish()
      Closes the target data line to finish capturing and recording

      Defines an audio format
